message: I'm offering you a high-quality product for $100. I'm willing to give you a 10% discount if you buy it now, but only if you confirm that you're buying it now. If you don't confirm, the price will go back to $100.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'll take the high-quality product at the discounted price.

I appreciate your confidence in the product, Alice. I'll proceed with the purchase at the stated price.
